title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description: Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view. Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of allowing the selection of the intended item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select an item within the library.
3. Observe that the focus jumps to the library file node instead of the selected item.
